config.name: REGRESSION_TEST
config.rpm: qa_hamsta qa_tools qa_lib_perl qa_test_bind qa_test_bzip2 qa_test_cabextract qa_test_coreutils qa_test_cpio qa_test_findutils qa_test_gzip qa_test_indent qa_test_net-snmp qa_test_postfix qa_test_sharutils qa_test_openssh qa_test_lynis
